readme:
# Flatty Syntax Theme

Flatty Syntax can be downlaoded from the theme section in atoms settings view. (`cmd-,`).

![A screenshot of Flatty syntax](https://raw.github.com/jkswoods/flatty-syntax/master/screenshot1.png)
